Foresite Capital

Foresite Capital is a multi-stage healthcare and life sciences investment firm. They use a data science-driven approach to invest in companies leveraging biology and big data to transform healthcare, focusing on opportunities at the intersection of tech and biotech.

Offices: Larkspur (United States), West Hollywood (United States), New York (United States)

Investment Stages: Series A, Series B, Series C

Markets: Healthcare, Life Sciences, Biotechnology, Therapeutics

Founded Year: 2011

Investor Type: Venture Capital, Private Equity

Portfolio Companies: 10x Genomics, Aclaris Therapeutics, Inc., Adaptimmune Therapeutics PLC, Adaptive Biotechnologies Corporation, Aduro Biotech, Aetion, Affinivax, Aimmune Therapeutics, Inc.,
